name: Secret Relationship with Subordinate's Cocky Gal Wife
name_original: Secret Relationship with Subordinate's Cocky Gal Wife
description:
Event-collecting RPG
30 Basic CGs
3 BAD ENDS, 1 NORMAL END & 1 TRUE END

Change language:
Menu>Setting>UI>Language>English

---

A middle-aged man who has just divorced his wife
has no home to return to and has become homeless living behind the park.
One night, he was woken up by a gal who
happened to be outside the tent, and was verbally insulted.
However, the two met again shortly after, and their positions reversed in an instant—

「Why didn't you tell me you're Takayuki-san's superior!?
　Guh...okay, I will do it!」
「Huh!? You didn't tell me you're his wife either, did you!?
　Heheh, if you don't apologize now, I might do something bad to your husband, you know~」
